vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
Honey.GetFreebie (0xe4eabdca81e31d9acbc4af76b30f532b6ed7f3bf.sol#8-13) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(this.balance) (0xe4eabdca81e31d9acbc4af76b30f532b6ed7f3bf.sol#11)
